body_html:
@MacwinWin ,
It looks like you ran out of memory on the card, see third line from the end. Can you try with changing gpu memory allocation parameters and workspace size and try again? Are you by any chance driving X on your GPU 0 as well? if you run nvidia-smi you can see which processes are running on the card and free memory.
@kahkeng,

Please see my response above. You need to use 14.04 version of the TRT libraries NOT 16.04.
